modules.name: LaunchControl Core
modules.description: Main controller for Novation Launch Control XL MK2

modules.name: Knob Expander
modules.description: Outputs all 24 knob CV values from Core module

modules.name: Gate Expander
modules.description: Outputs all 16 button gate states from Core module

modules.name: Sequencer Expander
modules.description: Outputs triggers and CV from all 8 sequencers

modules.name: Clock Expander
modules.description: Provides per-sequencer clock inputs (place on LEFT of Core)
